description: Try your hand at this chicken and mushroom pie recipe. Toss all the ingredients in a bowl, place in a baking dish and top with pastry for the easiest pie ever.
keywords: Chicken pie,Tree nut free,Jun 2021,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,High protein,High fibre,Autumn,Chicken,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Toss ’n’ Bake Chicken & Mushroom Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch sage, leaves picked, roughly chopped
500g chicken thigh fillets, fat trimmed, cut into 2cm pieces
2 sheets frozen puff pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 210°C/190°C fanforced. Grease a 25cm round (5cm deep) baking dish. Place dish on a large baking tray.
Combine cornflour, onion powder and sage in a large bowl. Add chicken, mushroom, carrot and peas, tossing to coat. Add sauce, mustard and sour cream, stirring to combine. Transfer mixture to dish.

Stack pastry sheets. Using a rolling pin, roll out until large enough to cover dish. Cut a 2cm circle from pastry centre. Drape pastry over pie filling and trim excess pastry (see Tip). Press edges to seal. Brush with egg.
Bake for 45 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and pastry is golden. Serve pie topped with spinach.
